Export.Routine:
WWWDRAGDROP11(YINNER,YELEMENT) #include COMSYS ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; Window Handling BEARBEITUNGSFENSTER ; ; Inputs : ; YINNER ; YELEMENT ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 16-Dec-2008 GRF Doco ; 07.06.2004 BEC 25866: DA ZENTRALE DATEI ; 19.09.2003 FIS Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new ARBBEGINN,ARBSTUNDEN,BUTTONLINE,CHART,COLUMNS,HEADLAENG,HEADSIZE,PIXEL,SATZ new START,TIMESIZE,YBGCOLOR,YFELDNAME,YHTMFORM,YKEY,YNOEVENTKEY,YSKEY,YYKEY IF +$GET(YINNER)=1 QUIT $$INNERHTML($GET(YELEMENT)) ; FIXME : This routine doesn't return values SET CHART=$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","CHART",1)) IF CHART="" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(46) QUIT ; "No Data Available" SET CHART1=$$VORG^WWWDRAGDROP(CHART) ;VORGABEN CHART ; "No Data Available" IF ($PIECE(CHART1,Y,21)="") || ($PIECE(CHART1,Y,22)="") WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(46) QUIT SET YELEMENT=$GET(YELEMENT) IF YELEMENT="" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(46) QUIT ; "No Data Available" SET YSKEY="" SET YKEY=$EXTRACT(YELEMENT,5,99) IF $FIND(YELEMENT,"_") SET YKEY=$EXTRACT($PIECE(YELEMENT,"_",1),5,99)_"-"_$PIECE(YELEMENT,"_",2) IF $PIECE(YELEMENT,"_",3,999)'="" SET $PIECE(YKEY,"-",3)=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YELEMENT,"_",3,999),"_",".") SET YKEY=$$^WWWTRANSLATE(YKEY,$CHAR(142),"%s%") IF $FIND(YKEY,"%s%") SET YSKEY=$PIECE(YKEY,"%s%",2) SET YKEY=$PIECE(YKEY,"%s%",1) SET YYKEY=YKEY IF YSKEY'="" SET YYKEY=YYKEY_"%s%"_YSKEY SET SATZ=$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","DATEN",YYKEY,1)) IF SATZ="" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(46) QUIT ; "No Data Available" SET YHTMFORM="WWW" WRITE "
" SET COLOR="white" IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,20)'="" DO ;FARBE ;tincture . SET COLOR=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,$PIECE(CHART1,Y,20)) . IF COLOR'="" SET COLOR=$PIECE($GET(^WWW100(0,"FARBE",SPRACHE,COLOR,1)),Y,1) IF COLOR="" SET COLOR="white" SET YBGCOLOR=$PIECE($GET(^WWW012(0,YM,1)),Y,5) IF YBGCOLOR'="" SET YBGCOLOR=$PIECE($GET(^WWW100(0,"FARBE",SPRACHE,YBGCOLOR,1)),Y,1) IF (YBGCOLOR="") || (YUSERAGENT="MSIE") SET YBGCOLOR="buttonface" DO . $$$StartScript() . ;WRITE YCR,"" . $$$EndScript() . WRITE YCR . $$$StartScript("for=document event='onkeyup()'") . ;WRITE YCR,"" . $$$EndScript() . WRITE YCR,YCR DO . NEW YFELD,YNUM,SIZE,YTYP,PTOP,PLEFT,YDATEI,SEQ . SET SIZE=+$PIECE(CHART1,Y,28) ;SCHRIFTGRÖSSE BEARBEITUNGSFENSTER IN PIXEL ;within . IF +SIZE=0 SET SIZE=8 . ; . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"
" . ; . DO FS^WWWTAB($$^WWWTEXT(32914),2) ; "Change Data" . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"
" . ; . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" . ; . ;DATENFELDER . SET $PIECE(CHART1,Y,69)=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(CHART1,Y,69),",",";") . SET YNUM="" . FOR SET YNUM=$ORDER(^WWWDRAGDROPD(0,CHART,YNUM)) QUIT:YNUM="" IF '$FIND(";"_$PIECE(CHART1,Y,69)_";",";"_YNUM_";") SET $PIECE(CHART1,Y,69)=$PIECE(CHART1,Y,69)_";"_YNUM . ;SET YNUM="" . ;FOR SET YNUM=$ORDER(^WWWDRAGDROPD(0,CHART,YNUM)) QUIT:YNUM="" DO . FOR YNUM(1)=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE($PIECE(CHART1,Y,69),";",YNUM(1),999)="" SET YNUM=$PIECE($PIECE(CHART1,Y,69),";",YNUM(1)) DO . . QUIT:$TRANSLATE(YNUM,";")="" . . SET YFELD=$GET(^WWWDRAGDROPD(0,CHART,YNUM,1)) . . QUIT:$PIECE(YFELD,Y,4)'=1 ;KEINE ANZEIGE ;no Show . . SET YFELDNAME="Y"_$TRANSLATE(YKEY,".-","__") . . IF YSKEY'="" SET YFELDNAME=YFELDNAME_"_s_"_YSKEY . . SET YFELDNAME=YFELDNAME_"M"_YNUM . . SET YDATEI = $PIECE(YFELD,Y,9) . . SET YTYP = $PIECE(YFELD,Y,2) . . IF YTYP="" SET YTYP=6 . . IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW1221(0,CHART,YNUM,SPRACHE,1)),Y,1)'="" SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)=$PIECE(^(1),Y,1) . . ;IF +$PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)'=0 IF $DATA(^WWW009(0,SPRACHE,+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,1))) SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)=$$^WWWTEXT($PIECE($PIECE(YFELD,Y,1),";",1)) . . ;IF $EXTRACT($PIECE(YFELD,Y,1),1,3)="$$^" XECUTE "SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)="_$PIECE($PIECE(YFELD,Y,1),";",1) . . ; . . WRITE YCR,"" . ; . DO ;SPEICHER-INFO . . WRITE YCR,"" . ; . WRITE YCR,"
" . WRITE " " . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32789)_": "_YKEY ; "ID-No." . IF YSKEY'="" WRITE " ("_YSKEY_")" . IF YSKEY="" IF +$PIECE(CHART1,Y,68)'=0 WRITE " ("_$PIECE(SATZ,Y,$PIECE(CHART1,Y,68))_")" ;DATENFELD BESCHRIFTUNG . ; . WRITE YCR,"
" . ;WRITE YCR," " . WRITE YCR,"
" . . WRITE YCR," ",$PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)," " . . WRITE YCR, "" . . ; . . ;INPUT FIELD . . IF YDATEI="" DO . . . WRITE YCR,"" . . . ; . . . ;;IF YTYP=1 IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,3)=1 DO ;KALENDER . . . . WRITE " " . . . . WRITE "" . . . . WRITE "" . . . . WRITE "",YCR . . . . WRITE " " . . . ; . . . IF YTYP=1 IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,3)=1 DO ;FIS;29.10.03;21655;KALENDER ALS MODAL WINDOW . . . . WRITE " " . . . . WRITE "" . . . . WRITE "" . . . . WRITE "",YCR . . . . WRITE " " . . ; . . ;SELECT FIELD . . IF YDATEI'="" DO . . . NEW RELK,RELF,YI,YINHALT,YDATEI1 . . . SET RELK=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,10) ;RELATIONS PRIMÄRSCHLÜSSEL . . . IF RELK'="" FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(RELK,",",YI)="" IF '$FIND($PIECE(RELK,",",YI),"""") DO . . . . IF $DATA(@$PIECE(RELK,",",YI)) SET $PIECE(RELK,",",YI)=""""_@$PIECE(RELK,",",YI)_"""" QUIT . . . . SET $PIECE(RELK,",",YI)=""" """ . . . ; . . . SET RELF=+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,11) ;ANZEIGE FELD ;Show field . . . IF RELF=0 SET RELF=1 . . . SET YINHALT="" . . . IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM)'="" DO . . . . SET YDATEI1="^"_YDATEI_"("""_$$^WWWYM(YDATEI)_"""" . . . . IF RELK'="" FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(RELK,",",YI)="" SET YDATEI1=YDATEI1_","""_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(RELK,",",YI),"""")_"""" . . . . SET YDATEI1=YDATEI1_","""_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM),"""")_""",1)" . . . . IF $DATA(@YDATEI1) SET YINHALT=$PIECE(@YDATEI1,Y,RELF) . . . ; . . . IF YINHALT="" SET YINHALT=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM) . . . ; . . . WRITE YCR,"
" . . WRITE " " . . WRITE YCR,"" . . WRITE YCR,"" . . WRITE YCR,"
" . WRITE YCR,"
" . DO FSE^WWWTAB ; . ; . WRITE YCR,"
" . ; . DO . . ;SAVE BUTTON . . ;WRITE YCR," " . . WRITE YCR,"" . . WRITE "" ; "Save" . . WRITE "",YCR . . ; . . ;CANCEL BUTTON . . ;WRITE " " . . WRITE YCR,"" . . WRITE "" ; "Close" . . WRITE "",YCR . ; . ;-------------------------------------------- BUTTONS JE DATENFELD ------------------------------- . ; . ;FORMULAR BUTTONS ;form . IF $ORDER(^WWW124s(0,1,1,YFORM,SPRACHE,""))'="" DO ;BUTTONS . . DO . . . NEW YFELD,YKEY,YBUTT,YYBUTT,YPOS . . . SET YKEY="" . . . SET YFELD=SATZ . . . SET YBUTT="" . . . SET YPOS="" . . . FOR SET YPOS=$ORDER(^WWW124s(0,2,$$^WWWUMLAU(YFORM,1),$$^WWWUMLAU(SPRACHE,1),YPOS)) QUIT:YPOS="" DO . . . . SET YYBUTT="" . . . . FOR SET YYBUTT=$ORDER(^WWW124s(0,2,$$^WWWUMLAU(YFORM,1),$$^WWWUMLAU(SPRACHE,1),YPOS,YFORM,SPRACHE,YYBUTT)) QUIT:YYBUTT="" DO . . . . . IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW124(0,YFORM,SPRACHE,YYBUTT,1)),Y,25)="" QUIT ;NUR MANUELLE LINKS ;only on the left . . . . . IF +$PIECE($GET(^WWW124(0,YFORM,SPRACHE,YYBUTT,1)),Y,10)=0 QUIT ;NUR WENN FELD ZUGEORDNET ;only when field . . . . . SET YBUTT=YBUTT_YYBUTT_";" . . . ; . . . IF YBUTT'="" DO ^WWWFORMB . ; . WRITE YCR,"
" SET YNOEVENTKEY=1 DO ^WWWFORM8 DO EVENT^WWWFORM ;CSP HYPEREVENT SET YNOFOOT=1 QUIT INNERHTML(YELEMENT) ;BEARBEITUNGSFENSTER INNERHALB HTML SEITE ;inside HTML side ;************************************************************ ;NICHT FERTIG ! 1: ÜBERGABESTRING IN HYPEREVENT ZU GROSS ;Not ready-made within within ; 2: ÜBERGABE MIT ESCAPE Z.ZT, NUR MIT WEBLINK ;************************************************************ NEW HTML SET HTML="" SET YHTMFORM="WWW" DO . SET YELEMENT=$GET(YELEMENT) . IF YELEMENT="" SET HTML=$$^WWWTEXT(46) QUIT ; "No Data Available" . SET CHART=$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","CHART",1)) . IF CHART="" SET HTML=$$^WWWTEXT(46) QUIT ; "No Data Available" . SET CHART1=$GET(^WWWDRAGDROP(0,CHART,1)) . IF ($PIECE(CHART1,Y,21)="") || ($PIECE(CHART1,Y,22)="") SET HTML=$$^WWWTEXT(46) QUIT ; "No Data Available" . SET SIZE=$PIECE(CHART1,Y,28) . IF +SIZE=0 SET SIZE=8 . SET PIXEL=$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","PIXEL",1)) ;FELDGRÖSSE . IF PIXEL'>0 SET PIXEL=17 . ; . SET YSKEY="" . SET YKEY=$EXTRACT($PIECE(YELEMENT,"_",1),5,99)_"-"_$PIECE(YELEMENT,"_",2) . IF $PIECE(YELEMENT,"_",3,999)'="" SET $PIECE(YKEY,"-",3)=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YELEMENT,"_",3,999),"_",".") . IF $FIND(YKEY,"%s%") SET YSKEY=$PIECE(YKEY,"%s%",2) SET YKEY=$PIECE(YKEY,"%s%",1) . SET YYKEY=YKEY . IF YSKEY'="" SET YYKEY=YYKEY_"%s%"_YSKEY . ; . SET SATZ=$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","DATEN",YYKEY,1)) . IF SATZ="" SET HTML=$$^WWWTEXT(46) QUIT ; "No Data Available" . ; . SET COLOR="white" . IF $PIECE(CHART1,Y,20)'="" DO ;FARBE ;colour . . SET COLOR=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,$PIECE(CHART1,Y,20)) . . IF COLOR'="" SET COLOR=$PIECE($GET(^WWW100(0,"FARBE",SPRACHE,COLOR,1)),Y,1) . ; . IF COLOR="" SET COLOR="white" . ; . DO . . DO . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"" . . . ;SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"" . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"" . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"" . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"" . . . ; . . . ;SAVE BUTTON ; "Save" . . . DO . . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"" . . . ; . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"
" . . . SET HTML=HTML_" " . . . SET HTML=HTML_$$^WWWTEXT(32789)_": "_YKEY ; "ID-No." . . . IF YSKEY'="" SET HTML=HTML_" (#"_YSKEY_")" . . . ; . . . ;X SCHLIESSEN . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"" . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"" ; "Close" . . . SET HTML=HTML_"" . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR . . . ; . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"
" . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_" " . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"" . . . ; . . . ;DATENFELDER . . . SET YNUM="" . . . FOR SET YNUM=$ORDER(^WWWDRAGDROPD(0,CHART,YNUM)) QUIT:YNUM="" . . . . SET YFELD=$GET(^WWWDRAGDROPD(0,CHART,YNUM,1)) . . . . QUIT:$PIECE(YFELD,Y,4)'=1 ;KEINE ANZEIGE ;no Show . . . . SET YFELDNAME = "Y"_$TRANSLATE(YYKEY,"-.","__")_"M"_YNUM . . . . SET YDATEI = $PIECE(YFELD,Y,9) . . . . SET YTYP = $PIECE(YFELD,Y,2) . . . . IF YTYP="" SET YTYP = 6 . . . . IF +$PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)'=0 IF $DATA(^WWW009(0,SPRACHE,+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,1))) SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)=$$^WWWTEXT($PIECE($PIECE(YFELD,Y,1),";",1)) . . . . IF $EXTRACT($PIECE(YFELD,Y,1),1,3)="$$^" XECUTE "SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)="_$PIECE($PIECE(YFELD,Y,1),";",1) . . . . ; . . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"
" . . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_" "_$PIECE(YFELD,Y,1)_" " . . . . SET HTML=HTML_"" . . . . ; . . . . ;INPUT FIELD . . . . IF YDATEI="" DO . . . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"" . . . . . ; . . . . . ;IF YTYP=1 IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,3)=1 DO ;KALENDER . . . . . . SET HTML=HTML_" " . . . . . . SET HTML=HTML_"" . . . . . . SET HTML=HTML_"" . . . . . . SET HTML=HTML_""_YCR . . . . . ; . . . . . IF YTYP=1 IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,3)=1 DO ;FIS;29.10.03;21655;KALENDER ALS MODAL WINDOW . . . . . . SET HTML=HTML_" " . . . . . . SET HTML=HTML_"" . . . . . . SET HTML=HTML_"" . . . . . . SET HTML=HTML_""_YCR . . . . ; . . . . ;SELECT FIELD . . . . IF YDATEI'="" DO . . . . . NEW RELK,RELF,YI,YINHALT,YDATEI1 . . . . . SET RELK=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,10) ;RELATIONS PRIMÄRSCHLÜSSEL . . . . . IF RELK'="" FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(RELK,",",YI)="" IF '$FIND($PIECE(RELK,",",YI),"""") SET $PIECE(RELK,",",YI)=""""_@$PIECE(RELK,",",YI)_"""" . . . . . SET RELF=+$PIECE(YFELD,Y,11) ;ANZEIGE FELD ;Show field . . . . . IF RELF=0 SET RELF=1 . . . . . SET YINHALT="" . . . . . IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM)'="" DO . . . . . . SET YDATEI1="^"_YDATEI_"("""_$$^WWWYM(YDATEI)_"""" . . . . . . IF RELK'="" FOR YI=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(RELK,",",YI)="" SET YDATEI1=YDATEI1_","""_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(RELK,",",YI),"""")_"""" . . . . . . SET YDATEI1=YDATEI1_","""_$TRANSLATE($PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM),"""")_""",1)" . . . . . . IF $DATA(@YDATEI1) SET YINHALT=$PIECE(@YDATEI1,Y,RELF) . . . . . ; . . . . . IF YINHALT="" SET YINHALT=$PIECE(SATZ,Y,YNUM) . . . . . ; . . . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"
" . . . . SET HTML=HTML_" " . . . . SET HTML=HTML_"" . . . . SET HTML=HTML_"" . . . . SET HTML=HTML_""_YCR . . . . ; . . . . ;CANCEL BUTTON ; "Close" . . . . SET HTML=HTML_" " . . . . SET HTML=HTML_"" . . . . SET HTML=HTML_"" . . . . SET HTML=HTML_""_YCR . . . . SET HTML=HTML_" " . . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"" . . . . ; . . . . ;SPEICHER-INFO . . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"" . . . . ; . . . . SET HTML=HTML_YCR_"
" IF HTML="" SET HTML=$$^WWWTEXT(46) ; "No Data Available" QUIT "#FUNCTION~document.getElementById(""edit"_$TRANSLATE(YKEY,".-","__")_""").innerHTML=unescape("""_$$ESC^%wldja(HTML)_""");"
